p.dialogue: "Do you like rainy days as much as I do, @?"
"We're different in so many ways... but that's alright."
"Good morning, @. I went out early and found this for you. [305 308 203 795 397]#$e#I hope it's not too strange."
"I wonder if the wizard knows about... this? I hope he can keep a secret.$s"
"As much as I try to be civilized, I have the urge to be mischievous sometimes...$6#$e#They say it's a condition of my people."
"Ah, It's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable."
"On nights like this, those who gaze out windows sometimes see shadowy figures. To think... it might've been me.$7"
"If the other shadow people knew about our living arrangement, they would... 'punish' me.$s#$e#Most of them despise humans, you know."
"You're sopping wet, and cold! Isn't that dangerous to your species?$s"
"I already had dinner, but it wasn't something you'd be able to eat... sorry."
"Ever since I left my people, I've been searching for a new home... now I belong somewhere. That means everything to me."
"It's said that my people came here long ago, when a great catastrophe allowed spirits from the void to cross into the physical plane."
"The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting.#$e#The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too."
"If I could come help you, I would... but I'll do my best to keep the house in order."
"I tried my best to make human food... [203 204 651 225]#$e#You can eat it later, don't worry about it..."

"I'm happy here, in the house. I like to spend all my time in a good spot... I don't need to \"get out\" like humans do.#$e#But I understand that you need to! Please don't feel like you have to stay here with me.$3"
"I'm considering spending my day all balled up and wedged in the corner...#$e#What? You mean you don't do that?$3"
"On Fridays, I like to stay quiet out of respect for Yoba. I hope you don't mind."
"I wish I could help you on the farm, but I can't go out in the sun..."
"I cleaned all the bugs out of the house today... Sorry, I didn't save you any! *smack*$7"
"You feel solid... sometimes I wish I had bones, too...$s"
"Sometimes I wonder if humans and shadow people could really ever co-exist... It's a lovely idea, but is it realistic?$s#$e#I hope so..."
"Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...#$b#I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling."
"I want to be a good housemate for you, but I never know if I'm doing well... *groan* $s#$e#I have a hard time understanding human expression. B... but... you're happy living with me?#$e#Okay!$7"
"Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h"
"I'll stay out here for just a bit, but we've got to be careful... if anyone approaches I'll need to hide!"
"It's rare that I can step outside!"
"What a beautiful day!$h"
"Wide open spaces make me nervous...$s"
"Please go about your day, I'll just stay here and guard the house."
"I'll wait here for a bit, and see if any bugs come my way.#$e#I haven't had breakfast yet!"
"I'm not sure how, but Yoba has blessed this house with a 'child'..."
"Don't worry... I already made %kid1 and %kid2 a void egg omelet."
"I worry about the future of the children... But I trust that Yoba has a plan for them."
"This house has been blessed with two children, now... Does that mean Yoba approves of our unconventional living arrangement?"
"I feel a sensation in my body... is this... 'platonic love'?$l#$b#... Oh, wait... I'm just shedding my skin.$s"
"I've learned to overcome my bias against humans... but Dwarves still disgust me.$a"
"You started nibbling on me during the night, and mumbling about 'black lick or ish'... what did you mean by that?$3"
"We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful.$h"
"I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful place.$l"
"I won't ever grow old, but you will. Sometimes it makes me sad... but that's okay.$s"
"Do you think your Grandpa would approve of a monster living in his house?"
"Do you think we could get in trouble for living together?$s"
"It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours.$s"
"I can't go outside, I can only eat certain food, I need the temperature a certain way... I hope it's not too much of a bother to live with me, @.$s"
"Welwick says I'm cursed today.$s"
"I'll tell you a secret... I don't actually sleep, I just lay there with my eyes closed..."
"You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me."
"I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun.$7"
"I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me."
"*sigh*... Maybe I should've stayed with my own kind.$s"
"...Do you still like me?$s"
"Are you still happy, living with me?$s"
"I think you'd be happier living with another human...$s"
"I've detected a change in your behavior... what does it mean? *groan*$s"
"You only have one short life to live... are you certain you want to spend it with a hideous creature like me?$s"
"Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...$s"
"You seem unhappy lately...$s"
"I miss the sewers.$s"
"What's your plan for the new year, @?"
"You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me."
"I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year."
"Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night...$h"
"It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein!$h"
"I don't feel like doing anything today."
"Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?"
"If I showed up to the Spirit's Eve festival they'd put me in a cage...$s"
"Thanks for letting me stay here, @. I'm looking forward to another great year!$h"
"#$c .5#We're so physically different that it's a challenge to live together, isn't it?#$e#I hope the humidity here isn't bothersome to you. We both have to compromise in order to live together!"
"It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish."
"You call this time of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny."
"It's been feeling a bit cooler lately, with a musty smell. You call this time of year 'fall', correct?"
"The darkness this time of year is very soothing. If only it were warmer!"
